trans-unit.source: Declaratively instructs the .NET Framework to perform time validation on a configuration property.
trans-unit.target: 구성 속성에 시간 유효성 검사를 수행 하려면.NET Framework를 선언적으로 지시 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스는 상속 될 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: You use the TimeSpanValidatorAttribute attribute to decorate a configuration property.
trans-unit.target: 구성 속성을 데코레이팅합니다 TimeSpanValidatorAttribute 특성을 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This is to instruct the .NET Framework to validate the property using the <xref:System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidator> class and pass to it the value of the decorating parameters.
trans-unit.target: 이.NET Framework를 사용 하 여 속성의 유효성을 검사 하도록 지시 하는 <xref:System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidator>클래스 및 데코레이팅 매개 변수의 값을 전달 합니다.</xref:System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidator>

trans-unit.source: You can apply TimeSpanValidatorAttribute objects to property types only.
trans-unit.target: TimeSpanValidatorAttribute 개체 속성 형식에만 적용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidatorAttribute"></xref> class.
You use this constructor in the attributed model to ensure that the type of the value assigned to the related property is a <xref:System.TimeSpan> object.
trans-unit.target: 특성 사용된 하는 모델에이 생성자를 사용 하 여 관련된 속성에 할당 된 값의 형식 인지 확인 한 <xref:System.TimeSpan>개체입니다.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to include or exclude the integers in the range as defined by <xref:System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidatorAttribute.MinValueString*> and <xref:System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidatorAttribute.MaxValueString*>.
trans-unit.target: 포함할지에 정의 된 대로 범위에 있는 정수를 제외할지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다. <> </> *> 및 <> </> *> 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The range is inclusive of the <xref:System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidatorAttribute.MinValueString%2A> and <xref:System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidatorAttribute.MaxValueString%2A> properties.
When the ExcludeRange property is `false`, the allowed values are outside the range.
trans-unit.target: 제외 범위 속성이 `false`, 허용 되는 값은 범위를 벗어납니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the value must be excluded; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>값을 제외 해야 하는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets the absolute maximum <xref:System.TimeSpan> value.
This is the absolute maximum value allowed by the .NET Framework.
Its value is defined by the <xref:System.TimeSpan> field.
The allowed maximum <xref:System.TimeSpan> value.
Gets or sets the relative maximum <xref:System.TimeSpan> value.
This is the relative maximum value as set by the user.
The allowed maximum <xref:System.TimeSpan> value.
The selected value represents less than <xref:System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidatorAttribute.MinValue*>.
Gets the absolute minimum <xref:System.TimeSpan> value.
This is the absolute minimum value allowed by the .NET Framework.
Its value is defined by the <xref:System.TimeSpan> field.
The allowed minimum <xref:System.TimeSpan> value.
Gets or sets the relative minimum <xref:System.TimeSpan> value.
This is the relative minimum value as set by the user.
The minimum allowed <xref:System.TimeSpan> value.
The selected value represents more than <xref:System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidatorAttribute.MaxValue*>.
Gets the absolute maximum value allowed.
The string that contains the maximum allowed value for the time interval.
trans-unit.target: 시간 간격에 허용 되는 최대값을 포함 하는 문자열입니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Gets the absolute minimum value allowed.
The string that contains the minimum allowed value for the time interval.
trans-unit.target: 시간 간격에 허용 된 최소 값을 포함 하는 문자열입니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Gets an instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidator"></xref> class.
You use the ValidatorInstance property to perform string validation by calling its <xref:System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidator.Validate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 호출 하 여 문자열 유효성 검사를 수행 하려면 ValidatorInstance 속성을 사용 하면 해당 <xref:System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidator.Validate%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Configuration.TimeSpanValidator.Validate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationValidatorBase"></xref> validator instance.
